name: LightGTCRFactory
description: LightGTCRFactory This contract acts as a registry for LightGeneralizedTCR instances.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitrator
parameterDecorators.description: Arbitrator to resolve potential disputes. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitratorExtraData
parameterDecorators.description: Extra data for the trusted arbitrator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _connectedTCR
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the TCR that stores related TCR addresses. This parameter can be left empty.

parameterDecorators.name: _registrationMetaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: The URI of the meta evidence object for registration requests.

parameterDecorators.name: _clearingMetaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: The URI of the meta evidence object for clearing requests.

parameterDecorators.name: _governor
parameterDecorators.description: The trusted governor of this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _baseDeposits
parameterDecorators.description: The base deposits for requests/challenges as follows: - The base deposit to submit an item. - The base deposit to remove an item. - The base deposit to challenge a submission. - The base deposit to challenge a removal request.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengePeriodDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The time in seconds parties have to challenge a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakeMultipliers
parameterDecorators.description: Multipliers of the arbitration cost in basis points (see LightGeneralizedTCR MULTIPLIER_DIVISOR) as follows: - The multiplier applied to each party's fee stake for a round when there is no winner/loser in the previous round (e.g. when it's the first round or the arbitrator refused to arbitrate). - The multiplier applied to the winner's fee stake for an appeal round. - The multiplier applied to the loser's fee stake for an appeal round.

parameterDecorators.name: _relayContract
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the relay contract to add/remove items directly.
